badges.lg: LG & GE THROUGH THE WALL AC RETAILER

services.subtitle: OAHU'S UNIQUE HIGH-HUMIDITY ENVIRONMENT AND SILENT SALT-AIR CORROSION DEMAND FAR MORE THAN OFF-THE-SHELF COOLING FOR THE DIVERSE MICRO-CLIMATES OF THE ISLANDS. FROM HIGH-EFFICIENCY WINDOW AC UNITS (LG & GE) CURATED FOR DURABILIT; ULTRA-QUIET DUCTLESS MINI SPLITS DESIGNED FOR PRECISION ZONE COOLING; CENTRAL AC RETROFITS ENGINEERED FOR TROPICAL ENERGY PERFORMANCE; AND SPECIALIZED WINDOW AC CLEANINGS THAT DEFEND AGAINST HAWAII'S RELENTLESS SALT-AIR HUMIDITY. WE OFFER PROVEN SOLUTIONS DESIGNED TO MAXIMIZE SYSTEM LIFESPAN, IMPROVE INDOOR AIR QUALITY, AND AGGRESSIVELY LOWER MONTHLY ENERGY COSTS FOR THE LONG TERM.

grid.title: MINI SPLITS
grid.description: Eliminate Hot Spots & High Bills. > Our ultra-quiet ductless mini splits provide targeted cooling for any size of rooms. Whether it’s a new Installation or a Retrofit for an older Oahu home, we offer full Service & Repairs to keep your sanctuary cool and quiet

grid.title: WINDOW AC SHOP
grid.description: Your Local High-Efficiency Resource. Skip the big-box logistics. We stock premium, DIY high-efficiency LG & GE Through-the-Wall units specifically chosen for their durability. Get expert advice on the right BTU for your space and schedule your pick up your unit today at our Waipahu location.

grid.title: CENTRAL AC
grid.description: Maximize Whole-Home Comfort. We provide professional Retrofits (Air Handlers & Condensers ONLY), SEER2 Efficiency Upgrades, and Full-Service, Maintenance and Repairs for  your Central AC system(s). Our professionals ensure your system is precisely tuned to handle Hawaii's humidity while lowering your monthly energy costs.

grid.title: WINDOW AC CLEANING
grid.description: Breathe Cleaner, Save Longer. High humidity and salt air are the leading causes of AC failure in the islands. Our Deep Cleaning window ac cleaning services lead by Technician, Chris Martinez, ensuring to assist with protecting your investment, improve indoor air quality, and prevent expensive breakdowns before they happen.

carousel.subtitle: Complete retrofit of a dual-inverter system in a coastal Oahu residence.

warehouse.title: Shop Location
warehouse.description: Our shop is stocked with window units. Order yours today
warehouse.directions_value: Arrive at Waipahu Commercial Center. Enter one-way drive in lane and continue towards the back warehouses. Make a left and continue down towards end of driveway. Destination is on right with roll up door #203.
